amr:
# ::snt classrooms are but buildings aren't?
(c / contrast-01
      :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
      :ARG1 (c2 / classroom)
      :ARG2 (b / building
            :polarity -))

comment: : All Ottawa police stations are closed. University of Ottawa in lockdown. Campus closed.
amr:
# ::snt : All Ottawa police stations are closed. University of Ottawa in lockdown. Campus closed.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / close-01
            :ARG1 (s / station
                  :mod (p / police)
                  :mod (c2 / city
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Ottawa"))
                  :mod (a / all)))
      :snt2 (l / lock-down-05
            :ARG1 (u / university
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "University"
                        :op2 "of"
                        :op3 "Ottawa")))
      :snt3 c
      :ARG1 (c3 / campus))
